roleset.name: (cause to) emit clicking sound

example.name: both args
example.text: Several times, Chinese guards have pointed their automatic rifles at young children of U.S. diplomats and clicked the trigger.

example.name: ergative
example.text: John's alarm clock clicked loudly on his bedside stand.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'click' based on sentences in wsj. VN classes hit-18.1, sound_emission-43.2, crane-40.3.2. Framenet entries Motion noise and Perception noise.

roleset.name: have good relations
roleset.note: Added by julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. Comparison to get_along.18.

example.name: both args
example.text: Sometimes the first therapist you see wo n't work for you , but if that happens , keep trying and look for a different counsellor until you find one who-1 you click with *-1 , because it will be worth it I promise you .
